History.1: Demonstrate significant knowledge of chronology, geography, and events in history.
History.2: Demonstrate the ability to analyze original historical documents and sources.
History.3: Demonstrate the ability to analyze interpretations about the past in scholarly books and articles, including contextualizing, explaining, and corroborating sources.
History.4: Communicate historical knowledge and analysis in writing or other media, in which they demonstrate the ability to engage in problem solving and historical interpretation.
History.6: Communicate historical knowledge and analysis in writing or other media.
